description: System-generated primary key uniquely identifying this calendar lockout record.
Calendar date (and time, if applicable) the lockout applies to.
Likely a boolean/status indicating the date is blocked from scheduling or assignments; confirm exact values and behavior with SME.
Free-text notes explaining the reason, scope, or context for the lockout.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Intended to capture who last changed the record; sample shows a timestampâ€”confirm whether this stores user ID or date/time with SME.
Identifier of the user who originally created the record.
Date and time when the record was created (per user/audit trail).
Identifier of the user who most recently modified the record.
Date and time of the most recent modification by a user (audit trail).
